abstract: The World Bank and the International Monetary Fund said they would increase their lending to poor countries, but they warned that the financial crisis was far from over.
snippet: The World Bank and the International Monetary Fund said they would increase their lending to poor countries, but they warned that the financial crisis was far from over.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  Top officials at the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund pledged Thursday to increase their lending to poor countries, warning that the global financial crisis was far from over.

headline.main: Global Finance Officials Promise More Help, but Seek It, Too
headline.print_headline: Global Finance Officials Promise More Help, but Seek It, Too
